item.title: How to install CRUX with encryption
item.description: How to install fully encrypted CRUX This post is for crux users who wanna secure their crux installation. Partitioning I’m gonna use two partitions. First boot partition will be unencrypted which holds kernel. I use secure boot with my own keys. You can find a post in my blog how to do that. and I have some ports too for secure boot. ;(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}) Unencrypted Boot Partition ;(adsbygoogle = window.
